about.title: about me
about.text:
Hello,

I'm Dimitar Statev

I'm a full-stack web developer passionate about creating applications and websites. I have experience in designing projects from first idea to production release both in front-end as in back-end. I'm pasionnate about good design and innovative technologies. I'm always seeking for improvement and high performance. I love working on all kind of web projects.

My tech stack:
I'm also familiar with:

I'm currently focused on mastering Angular. I'm planning to learn Next.JS and React Native.

contact.title: contact
contact.text: If you have any opportunity, suggestion or feedback, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out to me using the contact form or my contact details.
